name: Z-Outburst
description:
An experiment gone horribly wrong, a city left in ruins, a population of infected citizens, one man to fix it all. 

Zombie outburst is a first-person wave shooter where the goal of the game is to survive. You get to play as a militia soldier and you must fight your way through unending waves of zombies or find the source of the infection and put an end to it. In the game you can gather resources and unlock new weapons, progressing and exploring the ruined city.

  • Unlock new weapons.
  • Unlock and explore the environment.
  • Fight your way through zombie hordes.
  • Save the city. 

OS: Windows 10, 64-bit

Processor: Intel i5-4460 / Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent

Ram: 8 GB

GPU: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI / Radeon RX 550

Storage:  2 GB

Provided by Undead Elk Studios
